SELECT A.REP_ROUT_ID ,A.DAY_DIV ,B.REP_ROUT_NM ,B.ROUT_TYPE ,(SELECT STTN_NM FROM BMS_STTN_MST WHERE STTN_ID = A.ST_STTN_ID AND DEL_YN!='Y') ST_STTN_NM ,(SELECT STTN_NM FROM BMS_STTN_MST WHERE STTN_ID = A.ED_STTN_ID AND DEL_YN!='Y') ED_STTN_NM ,C.ROUT_NM FROM BRT_OPER_PL_MST A INNER JOIN BMS_REP_ROUT_MST B ON A.REP_ROUT_ID = B.REP_ROUT_ID INNER JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST C ON A.REP_ROUT_ID = C.REP_ROUT_ID
AND (ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || REP_ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%'))
AND ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND REP_ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
GROUP BY C.ROUT_NM, A.DAY_DIV ORDER BY B.REP_ROUT_NM, A.DAY_DIV

SELECT A.REP_ROUT_ID ,A.DAY_DIV ,A.WAY_DIV ,A.OPER_SN ,A.NODE_ID ,A.NODE_SN ,A.ALLOC_NO ,A.ROUT_ID ,A.COR_ID ,A.NODE_TYPE ,A.ARRV_TM ,A.DPRT_TM
,A.UPD_DTM ,A.UPD_ID ,B.REP_ROUT_NM ,B.WAY_ASC_NM ,B.WAY_DESC_NM ,C.NODE_NM FROM BRT_OPER_ALLOC_PL_NODE_INFO A INNER JOIN BMS_REP_ROUT_MST B ON A.REP_ROUT_ID = B.REP_ROUT_ID INNER JOIN BMS_NODE_MST C ON A.NODE_ID = C.NODE_ID WHERE A.REP_ROUT_ID = #{REP_ROUT_ID} AND A.DAY_DIV = #{DAY_DIV} ORDER BY OPER_SN, WAY_DIV, ALLOC_NO, ARRV_TM LIMIT 2000

SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM BRT_OPER_ALLOC_PL_NODE_INFO WHERE REP_ROUT_ID = #{REP_ROUT_ID} AND DAY_DIV = #{DAY_DIV} GROUP BY REP_ROUT_ID, DAY_DIV, WAY_DIV, ALLOC_NO, OPER_SN ORDER BY OPER_SN, REP_ROUT_ID, DAY_DIV, WAY_DIV, ALLOC_NO
